title: Gatorelf
author: Gatorelf
content: Has anyone had their PaperSafe notes graded ? If so did you keep it folded up or unfold it and will PCGS do this service?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: I have not heard or seen of any of them being graded yet.Not sure if PCGS would grade....  while it is a "note", would not fit in their standard bank note slab/case

comments.author: Gatorelf
comments.body: Good morning MJ, thanks..  Just checking.. I know PMG grades stock certificates and sizable Bonds like this one https://www.ebay.com/itm/134463660713?hash=item1f4ea8a2a9:g:ru0AAOSwaltgVasR&amdata=enc%3AAQAIAAAA0K%2BBSVEAvDVQzEn%2BHIalbLdP%2FSu%2FrjMWs3nBe1kiKh7NKvieceheVqZII6YiNiNJqr7GiXcTBknfvi4J2tF6WBhbN3pEqscbq2usxv7%2FqyeoWpwAacXtWTAQGbLcjPNlq9396y9z90edr9jeZCyOaPvwKmQb8t316EImeK35kBSF6zNp%2FHiHExjdSKdV5zB33MSH%2BLVO5Rk0OFqFe5VB6wiqVRTgserqOX0dzoF4OtcPlh7YD6XD2BMilg2G8nKoBuFteNcvPTHlVf7izuBjPuM%3D%7Ctkp%3ABFBMwO67p81ibut I prefer PCGS when I can get them. They had started grading crypto items just didn't know how far they were going with it.  Here is one of their Large Notes

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: ah nice, thank you for the infoGuess it wouldn't hurt to send one in to see if they will indeed grade it.
